metadata.title: USN-5034-1 -- c-ares vulnerability
metadata.description: Philipp Jeitner and Haya Shulman discovered that c-ares incorrectly validated certain hostnames returned by DNS servers. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform Domain Hijacking attacks.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5034-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libc-ares2 - 1.15.0-1ubuntu0.1 libc-ares-dev - 1.15.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
